SCTX:
Begin TribunalMain

short disablestate
short newstate

;by default, enable teleport and levitate
set newstate to 0

;only need to check cells in interiors
if ( GetInterior )
	if ( GetPCCell "Sotha Sil," == 1 )
		;disable teleport and levitate here
		set newstate to 1
	elseif ( GetPCCell "Mournhold" == 1 )
		;disable levitate only here
		set newstate to 2
	endif
endif

;if state should change
if ( disablestate != newstate )
	if ( newstate == 1 )
		DisableTeleporting
		DisableLevitation
	elseif ( newstate == 2 )
		DisableLevitation
	elseif ( newstate == 0 )
		EnableTeleporting
		EnableLevitation
	endif
	set disablestate to newstate
endif

end
